title: AHS 1984 Trailer Reaction
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: Leslie Grossman’s character (who’s name I think is Marcie) obviously has something to do with Mr. Jingles. In the beginning you can see a flash to her in bed (maybe a younger version of herself?)
I think that’s Richard Ramirez that was on Brooke’s (Emma) bed also the woman under the umbrella is frances conroy I think ❤️☠️

I noticed that the killer didint look like he did in the promos he had an almost identical outfit that the killer had in I know what you did last summer and in this trailer the group hit someone with their car also like the group did in I know what you did last summer so I wonder if this season will be a heavily based serial killer season now that we know there are already 3 kilkers. Mr Jingles, Richard Ramirez and whoever is the black hooded outfit. I am so excited for this season

Okay I just gotta couple things to get off my chest:

1. Living for the aerobics scenes. Omg they're too attractive.
